Applied Blockchain | L39 - London, UK | SENIOR, ONSITE | Node.js | Full Time

Node.js senior dev needed, please see the full specs here: https://stackoverflow.com/jobs/165106/senior-backend-nodejs-...

In short: Working with a great team mostly formed by Sr. Node and Ruby B/E Developers. Building APIs to be consumed by React/RN F/E apps (built in house). Currently in L39 - a great space to be in. Small agile teams (3-4 devs).

Building Ethereum based apps for both public (Web3-Accounts/Etherscan/Infura/Metamask) and private chain deployments (Web3 - Parity PoA). Previous blockchain experience not required.
